question: Could this be the reason why I feel dizzy all the time...?
question_content: I drink A LOT of coffee, basically, whenever I don't drink coffee in a couple of hours, I feel dizzy. Is it possible that the withdrawal of coffee is making me feel dizzy? Either that, or over 5 years ago, just before my dizziness started, (I feel dizzy whenever I sit down or stand up) my sister stuck a paintbrush in my ear, could it have damaged my eardrum? I also having ringing and buzzing in my ears occasionally.
